name: Mead Archon
description: The Mead Archon is a Medium celestial being, known for its vibrant charm and a whimsical aura of drunkenness. It has exceptional physical attributes and uses a maul for melee attacks, dealing significant bludgeoning damage. The archon also possesses a unique touch attack that can poison enemies.
memorable: The ability to create healing potions from alcohol and its drunken aspect that affects its abilities make this archon uniquely entertaining.
goals: To support allies in battle and create healing potions, adding a layer of utility to its party.
relations: May be encountered with other celestials or good-aligned creatures; often allies in quests for justice or protection.
environment: Typically found in realms associated with positive celestial influences or celebrations involving festivities.
strengths: Magic resistance and versatile spellcasting abilities enhance its effectiveness in various situations.
weaknesses: Lower physical damage compared to other combat-centric creatures.
attacks: Capable of making powerful melee and ranged attacks, including a hammer strike and radiant bolts, along with a unique poisoning touch.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to turn alcohol into healing potions once per day, providing invaluable support to allies.
senses: The archon has darkvision that allows it to see in darkness up to 60 feet.
skills: Proficient in athletics, showcasing strong physical capabilities.
additional_information: Has advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Weapon attacks are considered magical, effective against resistant creatures.
Can intrinsically cast spells enhancing ally capabilities or curing ailments.
Unique ability called Divine Guzzle allows varied effects based on alcohol consumption.
Resistant to poison and radiant damage, further increasing its durability.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster able to cast spells such as aid and lesser restoration once per day.
